articles.title: Drake Bell's brother called the police after he made 'distraught and made suicidal statements' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Drake Bell's brother Robert reportedly called Orlando Police Department to express concern for his sibling, who was reported 'missing and endangered' on Thursday.
